website_summaries.verdict: A top pick in sensitive baby wipes at a lower price point than many other brands.
pros: Although they are a bit less expensive, these wipes provide comparable results to bigger name brands
Consumers comment on the good ingredients, quality of the wipes, and gentleness on skin
cons: Some inconsistencies in moisture levels – some felt they were too dry and others too moist
may not work for all sensitive skin types

customer_reviews.title: Toxic harmful ingredient for babies!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The second ingredient listed is phenoxythenol which is toxic for babies! See picture for details, but this chemical is known to cause reproductive damage and nerological issues. I wish I had known this before buying a bulk order :(
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Left a rash
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! They aren't as wet as some others and are a great value. However, the sensitive ones gave my little one a rash on his bum. I thought it was diaper rash until I used a wipe on his face after using it on his hands during a solid food feeding and it left a horrible rash 😣
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.  Horrible wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I was basically forced to try these because, the prices of the Huggies suddenly were outrageous. These are the worst wipes I’ve ever used. You have to double them up at minimum when wiping. Most importantly they don’t “wipe” well. Meaning they don’t actually wipe; instead bunch up. Don’t waste your money. I hate that amazon almost forces the purchase of their named products by making the prices of the most popular products prices insane.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Different, smelly formula
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was only the packaging that changed but clearly the formula is different. These leave a horrid scent on my son. These are also drier than the previous formula. Bring back the old wipes!!
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: They ruined a good product :(
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Amazon brand wipes for years and recently reordered and got the "new and improved" version. These are horrible... They are smaller and are now made of some type of synthetic material that is non absorbent and "squeeks" across your skin which is annoying. I'm not one to send things back, but this is a redesigned product gone bad. Save your money, buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Terrible rash to 19mos old twins
customer_reviews.text: I usually use sensitive skin target or pampers but wanted to try these since I liked the amazon diapers. I had to get my twin boys on rx from doctor to calm the rash after using these wipes. It was worst diaper rash They have ever had - to point it looked blistered/burned. Do not get them if your kids have any sensitivity!!! They are not for sensitive skin even though it says they are- there is something in there that really flares up the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the change.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Amazon's wipes for literally YEARS. My subscription was recently converted to their Advanced Sensitive set. I'm not a fan! They are barely moist in comparison to their other ones that it requires nearly double the amount of wipes to complete a diaper change (and I have a package of their former Sensitive wipes available for comparison). Disappointed and will be unsubscribing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, packaging needs work
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wipes. They are thinner than Huggies, but still clean up nicely. My only complaint is the packaging. The plastic top that you use to access the wipes sometimes falls off--which leads to wipes drying out. This has happened to 3 packages out of 12. Not a deal breaker, but frustrating. The picture is of the package that came in the Baby Registry package. The top had come off in transit and the tissue paper in the package stuck to the wipes so I couldn't stick the dispenser part back on.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L

customer_reviews.title: Good value but with 1 major issue...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are without a good value for the price you pay. But my biggest complaint is that sometimes the sheets get stuck together and you have to use both hands to separate the sheets. The is a total deal breaker because if I am changing my baby who just had a accident, my left hand is lifting their legs and my right is wiping and cleaning and if I need to get another sheet, I have put their legs back down. They should separate easily even if you pull them out 1 sheet at a time. This is last time I purchase these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes i have used!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Member's Mark brand baby wipes and I like them. This is my first time purchasing the Amazon elements baby wipes and I am extremely impressed. The wipes do stretch lengthwise but not really with wise. They have cotton woven into them and they are extremely soft. I compared it side-by-side with Member's Mark and they are much easier on the skin. Both Brands I buy sensitive and neither cause any irritation. Though I do enjoy the feeling of my skin after the sensitive Amazon more than I do the members Mark brand ones. I really think they are great value and a fantastic product. I will most likely make this my always purchase from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sam.Ramon

customer_reviews.title: TOO soft, not enough substance to actually do its job. You'll be scrubbing poop off your hand.
customer_reviews.text: I love Amazons diapers, so I decided to try these. I'm very particular about wipes and these are just awful. They are weirdly smooth and soft, but so much so that when you go to wipe a poopy butt, the wipe just crumples in on itself and wads up and you end up with a nice handful of baby poop and a crumpled up useless wipe. Will not order again. I didnt even use the ones we had, I gave the opened pack along with all the unopened packs to a family member to use while camping. I recommend costco Kirkland wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnon Ruth

customer_reviews.title: not moistened enough
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these amazon baby wipes but not anymore. I used to buy these when the huggies baby wipes were not on sale, because even though they are not as soft and moistened as the huggies, they were still good enough. The most recent shipment however, was disappointing because I have to keep flipping the whole packet of wipes upside down for it to be a little bit moistened for the next round. So everytime my toddler finishes wiping, I tell her to flip it upside down. every single time. otherwise, it will be dry the next time shes uses it. Very disappointing. I have now switched to target cloud island baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Dori O.

customer_reviews.title: New Formula?  Overwhelming floral scent with this batch...
customer_reviews.text: Normally these are perfectly fine, unscented, soft on skin. My recent subscribe and save order was just opened and I'm not sure if there was a mix-up with the manufacturer or a formula change but these wipes smell awful. They have an overwhelming floral scent, which has never been present before. It smells like a household cleaning wipe and not a baby wipe. It's so strong we are going to have to get a new order because I worry it will burn the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great, Unscented Wipes
customer_reviews.text: These come at a fair price and are very high-quality wipes. The containers and snap-top lids are phenomenal, and the wipes NEVER dry out. They are unscented, so they're great for sensitive skin. Also, they are very durable, so they won't fall apart when wiping, unlike competitor brands. Great product and a fair price. Absolutely no complaints and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wipes. Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: After three kids and countless wiping of baby bottoms, I cannot recommend these enough. Most important attributes of good baby wipes, in my opinion, are: 1. Damp (but not too soggy) 2. Thick (but not too thick) 3. Smell good These are a perfect combo of those. I love Pampers, but they are more expensive and a little on the damp side. I love Costco wipes, but they are a little too big/too thick. These are the perfect amount of dampness and thickness, and smell great. Also, if you subscribe to them on Prime, they're very affordable. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Latham

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: The ratings for this product have been really good, which I relied on. One negative comment I read about was the smell, but I bought them anyway as there were more positive reviews. Apparently I got one of the smelly packs. The first pack was okay. There was a bit of a smell, but not bad. Starting with the 2nd pack, the smell was not pleasant. Basically, I ended up using only one pack. There are other similar products that have better quality control. If you do a search on the word smell for all the ratings, especially the one star rating, there are quite a few comments about the bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: WL

customer_reviews.title: Not just for baby butts
customer_reviews.text: They are really good, thick, soft, large and gentle with no scent. We keep them in the car and bathroom. They are great for traveling, messy hands and faces as well as a quick clean up on the seats in your car..... and so much more. The people at church were so thankful that I had a bunch at our BBQ. No one else thought of having something that is lightly moist and will take care of the big messes that paper towles just stick to. I'm talking about the stuff that sticks to faces and hands. Great for camping too. These are not just for baby butts.
customer_reviews.author: House of Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality, big supply
customer_reviews.text: I received SIX individual packets of wipes (didn't read the listing close enough, I guess!) and that is a big supply. I buy baby wipes for all purpose wipes because they are a better bargain. The quality of these is substantial; just the right size, strength, moistness and thickness. These packets are not refills, each one has a dispenser. I put one in the kitchen, bathroom, and my car, and brought one to work....and I gave the remaining two to each of my daughters. Every once in a while you come across a great deal, and this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Montalbano

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula :-(
customer_reviews.text: We were loyal subscribers to these Amazon wipes; however, the last batch we got had a HORRIBLE scent - smells like laundry or dishwashing detergent. They use to be unscented. I'm not sure what's wrong with this batch, but not taking my chances and keeping our subscribe & save. I've switched to another product. Sure wish they'd warn you when they change a formula for a product used for sensitive baby bums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE ON A BABY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE these on your baby! I bought these for myself and in a few days I had so much burning “down there,” which I did not understand the cause of, that I went to the doctor. She couldn’t find a cause or see anything visually wrong . I experimented with stopping using the wipes and got immediately better. The only way I can.use these is to rinse them out thoroughly in water first. If you use these on your baby and he or she has the reaction I did you will not know why your infant is so irritated and fussy. I cannot NOT RECOMMEND these enough.
customer_reviews.author: James Bockhorst

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Durable - No flushing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I have been buying Cottonelle GentlePlus Flushable Wipes. I purchase them last year but when it was time to buy more they were triple the price. Unbelievable. So I was forced to try something else and this product is way better. They are not flushable but totally worth it. They have a nice size, super soft, little scent if any and clean very well for adults. I don't have children but I can see how babies may like them and why parents may use them. Soft but durable. Purple label-sensitive, box of 6 w/80 sheets in each for less than $13. You can't beat the price. Thx Amazon! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Caused Skin Breakout
customer_reviews.text: These purple ones are horrible, whatever is or isn’t in them broke out my 8 month old’s skin. I used them trice and her skin is broken out. I usually buy the green ones or the blue ones and those were fine. I also don’t like the wipes themselves, texture-wise. I don’t know if they changed something or it it’s just this purple set but never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!! Highly recommend!! 5+⭐️
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 22 years since I have had kids lol so I actually bought these because I have a dog that needs to be in diapers, and I wanted to make sure that I was able to clean her well in between changes because I can’t bathe her 4 times a day! My kids also have friends with little kids that come over once in a while and I use them for face and hand clean up! I was super impressed with these!! They are REALLY soft and thick sheets! You literally can not beat the value for these! The price for the amount you receive. I have already recommended them to many people!
customer_reviews.author: amanda lynn champagne

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly surprised by these wipes! With 2 kids in diapers, we go through a TON of wipes. Both our babes have sensitive skin, so we’ve tried just about every “sensitive” wipe out there. These are so soft, strong, and don’t have an overwhelming scent like some other brands. This was my first ‘subscribe and save’ item and I’m very pleased. That makes it an even better deal AND I don’t have to worry about running out of wipes or forgetting to order more. Also, I wasn’t sure what to expect on the size of these packs, but they’re about twice the size of a regular package of pampers or huggies. Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very silky, smells great.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the smell and value of these wipes. Our only dislike as the silkiness of the wipes.... almost like they were so silky that it was hard to wipe our kids. Slippery is the best word i could use. We've tried other brands and can definitely tell a difference... all in all they got the job done and were a great value so I can't knock em that bad. Besides, the store shelves were empty because of this pandemic and amazon came through with the 8 pack right on time haha
customer_reviews.author: SotoFam

customer_reviews.title: New Formula NOT for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I used to swear by these wipes, but sadly they are no longer what they used to be. The wipes are now much drier, thinner, and rougher. The solution on the wipes has also changed because it started giving my son horrible diaper rashes which he'd never experienced before. I tried using these on my face to remove makeup and my face immediately started burning. Definitely not for sensitive skin. Hopefully they will change back to the old ones because it was such a good deal, but until then I do not recommend buying these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good Price But I Don't Like These At All!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Huggies packs for years & have been happy with them. Decided to try these since they're a couple of dollars cheaper. I'm not happy with these. They are soft & a good size but that's the only thing good about them. They're quite dry & they continuously pop up which means you've got to stuff the one you don't need back in the package to close the lid unless you'd like them to be even dryer. A moist wipe cleans better. A dry wipe is like wiping with TP. If you want TP, buy it instead of these. If you want a moist wipe, buy Huggies or similar. It's a no from me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: We've been getting the amazon basics sensitive wipes for over a year and amazon asked us to switch to these. They're dry!!! They arrived dry, you could tell the moment you picked up a pack that it was too light. When a wipe is dry nothing else matters, the softness, the scent, the sensitive features are worthless if it doesn't glide on the baby's butt.
customer_reviews.author: KMartins

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: When I initially purchased these, I had been using wipes from AnotherBrand that were thicker with less texture. The texture of the Amazon Elements wipes is perfect for cleaning and wiping (bottoms, noses, faces, sticky fingers... I wouldn't suggest using the same wipe for all, though!) without the need to harshly scrub. The wipes are fragrance-free, which is important! The package is easy to open and close. We haven't had any issues where we *think* we've closed the package but the wipes dry out, because the open/close mechanism is durable and effective. We like them so much that we order them on Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Babies!
customer_reviews.text: I send these to my daughter each month for my precious grandson. She loves them! She told me she uses them for more than his bottom. When they're out, she uses them for his face, to wipe off something he wants to play with, her own hands and face(she has very sensitive skin). The flip top packs are very convenient for home, a diaper bag and just leaving in the car. The Amazon brand is just as effective as the higher priced brands! Why waste money. Also the Subscribe and Save method saves you even more!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very dry.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Amazon basic wipes and loved them. When I tried to reorderthe kind I buy were unavailable so I ordered these. They are very dry and you have to use a lot of them to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I wasnt aware amazon had their own line of baby wipes. I normally buy the walmart brand because they're not a bad quality, they come in different scents according to babys skin, and are not. Bad price for the amount. However, now that I've tried Amazon's for the first time ever this month, ingame changed my preference. My new favorite baby wipes are amazon. They're very soft. More soft that walmarts. And the amount is just the same as theirs, but the price is slightly better, and it does count. The quality is soft. Thank you, amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the three categories listed in this review, these wipes are satisfactory but I could not give 5 stars all the way because it is not a five Star product. Yes the softness deserves a v and yes the scent deserve the five but the question of durability and thickness and fibrous texture was not asked.But they are fibrous and leave lint type fibers sometimes. Not what I expected but they serve a purpose for wiping after pee. I'm still going to use my Huggies one-and-done for a number 2
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: New version is dry!
customer_reviews.text: "advanced sensitive" wipes are nowhere near as good as the previous version -- they are so dry!
customer_reviews.author: LR84

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I will buy, and I’m a wipe snob. They are thick but not too thick. They are always wet, I don’t have to store them upside down. They don’t have a scent, which is perfect. They come out easily. I even used them to remove makeup haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Tried almost all the brands, these work best for our kids
customer_reviews.text: I went through nearly every brand of wipes with our three kids. These are the only ones that have never caused diaper rash, so we are big fans. This clearly varies with each family as some of the other brands that caused problems for our kids do not do so with friends' kids... but you never know. Give them a try if you're on the fence. I'd say the ONLY thing I don't really like is that the wipes don't really separate well from each other as you pull them out. It's a minor annoyance that I usually get around by pulling out what I need prior to a diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying the Amazon Elements wipes through my Subscribe and Save for the past few months, and they are just as good as the Huggies that I was buying previously. Wipes are thick, but not so thick that you can't tear them in half if you only need a half (can't do that with Pampers since they're wipes are too thick). They work well, don't have a strong scent. See lots of Amazon Elements wipes packages at daycare, obviously we're not the only ones that like them!
customer_reviews.author: Banana Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Very moist and has not irritated my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am used to using goat milk wipes in the bathroom. I use wipes a lot because of a post surgery issue that will continue my whole life. But, I have extremely sensitive skin on my entire body, especially the sensitive areas. Since I thought my brand of goat milk wipes were going to be discontinued, I researched and discovered these on Amazon for sensitive skin. I have been using them for a couple of weeks and so far, all has been well with no irritation. They are very moist, not dried out like some brands. I have tried many different brands for sensitive skin. I prefer these. Research and read the ingredient lists to help you decide.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and work really well. More importantly, they are gentle on baby’s bottom. However, I don’t like the smell of baby wipes in general and these are no different. Also, the packaging is extra loud which I find annoying but regardless, I continue to buy these over my preferred brand of Pampers Pure Protection because the two “complaints” I have are not enough for me to justify paying the higher cost for Pampers. Also, through subscribe and save, you save even more.
customer_reviews.author: JMe

customer_reviews.title: Great price, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in preparation for the birth of my first child. Due to the pandemic, these were the only brand available at the time of purchase. I’ve had luck with other Amazon brand products so I was hopeful these would be a good purchase, especially for the price. Now that our son is here and we are going through baby wipes like crazy, I’m really disappointed in the quality. They are soft and the scent is pleasant (very mild) but they dry out so quickly! We have to use twice as many wipes per diaper change as other brands (Pampers). I’m bummed about the quality because the price is great. It is unlikely I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lobb

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Amazon baby products and for the most part I’ve been impressed with the quality...except with the baby wipes. The outer packaging is great, I’ve had no issues with wipes getting dried out when the container gets low. With other brands I’ve had to throw away the container with 25% of the wipes still left in it because they all dried out. The packaging may be good but wipes themselves are the reason for this mediocre rating. They’re too thin and you have to use a lot of them to get your baby clean. The quality of the wipes doesn’t even come close to huggies or pampers wipes. They are nothing to get excited about.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't understand why there were so many great reviews, these are one of those wipes that lacks moisture extremely oh, and it doesn't wipe across your baby's bottom. It is extremely hard especially when they poop.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, good for sensitive skin, but a little thin.
customer_reviews.text: The only better baby wipes I've used are the Kirkland wipes. These are affordable and extremely gentle wipes to use on your little one. The only reason for the four star rating is that they are a little thin compared to the Kirkland brand wipes. This means that they don't clean as well as the thicker wipes, but they work just fine. Our little one has sensitive skin, and these are perfect for that purpose, but the Kirkland wipes don't seem to upset our toddler at all which is why we switched from the amazon wipes. However, you can't beat the convenience of automatic ordering on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs and also saves me a little money
customer_reviews.text: I’m not too picky with wipes. I use them on myself, but I go through quite a bit, and have sensitive skin, so, all I ask is for them to be gentle on my skin, and for me, these are. The one negative, but no stars deducted because this issue was shared by the supermarket generic brand I used to use, is sometimes, I end up taking out two or three wipes out when I use one hand to pull out one wipe. These packs contain 80 wipes, which is about 20 more than the ones I used to use, and costs about the same. So, these fit my needs, and are, per sheet, less expensive than the store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fujita, author of Toe Up to 10K: A Journey of Recovery from Spinal Cord Injury

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, great price
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters have very sensitive skin, I love using these wipes. They have a good amount of strength and enough liquid to "scrub" away any pesky spots without causing irritation to the skin or falling apart. I don't feel I need to use more wipes than normal when compared to other more expensive brands. I've used them for years now and have always been very happy with them. Pro tip: store your wipes upside down, it isn't -necessary- with these, but helpful for any packet of wipes. It'll make sure your top wipes are moist and the bottom ones aren't an overly soggy mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My son has a sensitive skin. For months, the only brand wipe we could use was Pampers Aqua wipes. We tried everything (16 different types of wipes). Anything else broke him out in a horrible rash after two uses. It was miserable. I was hesitant at first to buy these, since even pampers sensitive and water wipes (that are supposedly 99% water) led to rashes. So grateful we found these; they are considerably cheaper and work almost as well as pampers aqua wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Country boy

customer_reviews.title: I like these!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much. I've been using water wipes and huggies natural wipes when I'm on the go/water wipes would be inconvenient. These are gentle, soft, no harsh chemical smells like some wipes, and they actually seem to leave my son's skin moisturized. And I dont need to use 15 of them to try and clean a particularly messy diaper. I have extremely sensitive skin and I tested these on my face just to see, and didnt have any breakouts or rashes. I'll order again most likely. They're comparable to honest in the ingredient list, but much cheaper. I like them so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: They used to send them with a wipe dispenser because the actual wipes had a plastic "sticker" opening but now each bag comes with a more sturdy opening for easy opening and closing (major improvement
customer_reviews.text: You get so much for your money with these Amazon wipes. I've been using them since our son was born because other brands were so expensive and these literally do the job just as well. We got the sensitive wipes since he was a newborn and just kept using them (two years of using these). I also subscribed so that they're automatically sent to us and I don't have to worry about it (I ran out one time and learned my lesson). They used to send them with a wipe dispenser because the actual wipes had a plastic "sticker" opening but now each bag comes with a more sturdy opening for easy opening and closing (major improvement!).
customer_reviews.author: Jesica S.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and durable!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these! We have purchased the sensitive and the cucumber and all my kids love the smell of the cucumber ones. We use wipes for everything. Having 4 boys we keep them in every room and car for all types of messes and needs and these have not disappointed us. They are very soft and strong. I don’t need to use a bunch to clean a full diaper either. They are not rough or too wet. I use them on my face at night to take off my makeup and my boys use them at night to wipe their face before bed. I love that you can get these on auto shipment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Only wipes I use
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. I’ve tried all 3 of amazons wipes and would use all 3 over any of the other brands. They are not stiff, they don’t irritate my son, they aren’t overly wet... they are perfects wipes and they are inexpensive considering they each have their own pop top for reuse!! They are also large so 1 pack lasts so much longer than the other store bought brands. I have been using these since my son was born (other than the other brands that were gifted to me) I won’t change!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good for the value. We have been using them for our one year old daughter since birth. She has very sensitive skin and these work just fine. They don't really have a smell, unless you put your nose into them. I only wish they were a little more moist, even in a diaper warmer they manage to dry up a bit, enough that I need to use a mild baby wash to rehydrate them before use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my absolute favorite baby wipes - hefty enough to work for toddlers but gentle enough to work for babies too. The new version ("advanced sensitive"/hot air balloon package) has a significantly different ingredient list and now causes a terrible diaper rash. Will be looking elsewhere for wipes from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for your money and great product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many wipe brands out there and so fare the amazon elements brand is my favorite. They are great for my daughters skin which I consider sensitive, and come in a huge box and last us forever. They stay moist even if I leave the package open for a short time. My favorite wipes by far. I will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Maag

customer_reviews.title: So far no one has gotten any type of rash or bad reaction. I am very impressed with these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bulk pack of the sensitive wipes as my kids typically are very sensitive to wipes. So far no one has gotten any type of rash or bad reaction. I am very impressed with these wipes. I read several comments about them being dry, but I've just opened my second pack and so far they've been just fine. They're thicker than I expected as well. Overall I have nothing negative to say about them. Update*** these are by far my favorite wipes still. Very thick and never have had a problem with them being dry!
customer_reviews.author: andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us and the baby
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great and we have no complaints at all from us, the wiper, or the wipee as it were. Definitely comparable in all respects to the national brands and conveniently come right to your door. The packaging kept all the wipes wet for six months, though I would not recommend exceeding the dates on the package. We bought them ahead of time before she was born and have bought them again since along with other brands as deals pop up. If you don't know, you will be using many thousands of these with each kid or many hundreds during the year for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Johns

customer_reviews.title: Great Thick Wipes at a Great Price ~ Gentle and Non-Scented
customer_reviews.text: Although I do not have any little ones at home, these wipes are wonderful to have on hand at home. I have two Border Collies who love anything that can make a mess. These wipes are great for so many uses and are excellent quality. Nice to have ready for bathroom use, too. They are truly formulated for sensitive skin, and never cause any discomfort. No scent. I use them to remove make-up. I keep them in supply by adding them to my Subscribe and Save list, and save even more on the already low cost.
customer_reviews.author: RascalCate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! It was hard to find any wipes for a long time, as people were hoarding them. Amazon came through and had a great deal on this pack. I was Looking for some for my grandson. Great value and my daughter in Law said they are better than the name brand. Plus, extra points for having stock when everyone else was out.
customer_reviews.author: Red Wine Road

customer_reviews.title: Ordered during beginning of Corona Virus
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these when all wipes in stores were gone and we had never used this brand so we were nervous since our son has extremely sensitive skin. These had no reaction on him and they worked wonders. Thick enough to not rip or have bodily fluids get onto your hands LOL - but not thick that they're rough and uncomfortable. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipes. Great Price. Doo Doo It.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We go through baby wipes like nobody's business. Well, I mean except for my two boys'. Their business is so crazy and all over the place that I go through enough wipes to keep a baby wipe factory running by myself. I mean, if I could monetize dirty baby wipes then I'd be richer than Bobby Axelrod. Well, maybe not that level but maybe like at MaFee's level which is not bad at all. At all. He's a millionaire at least, right? Anyway, if you need wipes, don't have Billions (or millions), then just grab these and clean that sh*t off that wall of yours.
customer_reviews.author: Everymang

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite! Wipes are very durable, stretch a little and don't tear!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. They are tied for my all time favorite with target up&up brand baby wipes. I have 4 children so I've used an obscene amount of baby wipes over the last 12 years. Unlike most wipes that are thick and tear easily these are thinner, they do stretch a little which makes them much more durable. I've used both the sensitive and regular scent. No complaints about these wipes, they're my favorite, they are very budget friendly- especially if purchased with the subscribe and save program.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: DRIED UP
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 2 weeks ago @ $ 12. 29 now its $17.99 Amazon Basics part of the problem right along with all the other greed. What happened to not price gouging - for pete sake your doing it, really sad people are out of work, no food, no way to care for a baby with simple wipes, you should be ashamed. I wish you endless diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: SpankyBuns

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We used pampers exclusively with our first baby — when the second came I wanted to try something new that would save us a little money. These are great! Limited scent which we enjoy, stays wet but not so wet that the baby is wet (if that makes sense). And the package is a good size which means it actually lasts a good while! We use these exclusively now and I recommend them to other moms all the tim.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shrieves

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent wetness
customer_reviews.text: We used these several times. We bought them for the price. However, 2-3 wipes would come out each time and the top layer would dry out quickly. I read in a review that the wipes started set at the top and would become wet towards the bottom of the package, which I found true. In comparison to baby fabrics, I liked rhe amazon smell more, but I did not find the wipes as durable. In the end, since I had to throw away dried our wipes and with multiple wipes being pulled, consent back to baby fancies as I felt I was not really saving much money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for us! Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters super sensitive to all kinds of products, ESPECIALLY wipes. We’re on a third pack already and no rashes or irritation!! However, they are fairly thin. So I do find myself having to use a few more wipes than I’d normally use. For the price point, no complaints here. They are soft and do not have any strong scents.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: No soaps, dyes, colours, or stinky smells. Just clean.
customer_reviews.text: What I like best about these wipes is that they are truly scent free. I cannot abide the stinky odors manufacturers add to their products to cover up the fact that their products are full of chemicals and additives that smell. There are no additives, no odors, no perfumes or smelly soaps. Just nice, soft, fresh wipes that are good for washing faces and hands or as a substitute for toilet paper. But do not try to flush these!
customer_reviews.author: karma magers

customer_reviews.title: Very good option to toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: These were the next option to not finding toilet paper and honestly as an adult I don't think I will go back. Very thick well oackaged and the seal compartment is lovely more importantly not too moist so I see why alot of parents gave this brand such high reviews I ordered this and the scented really pleased with the price quality and quantitiy
customer_reviews.author: Lollie Marcelin

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this wipe for a long time, I have it on my “Subscribe & Save” account. The product is softer and larger than the products in the stores. (I do see where one of them is now a larger size now.). But this one is my go to for so long, it’s convenient to receive on a schedule, and it’s just a good product. I’m very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. There is no moisture to them, they are fuzzy and feel like they have hair in them and I can't get it off. I use these on my face and I can't stand them. I usually like everything I get from amazon but not these. I won't buy these again. My daughter doesn't like them either. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: 7 weeks or 70 years, you need these wipes!
customer_reviews.text: From newborn to senior we all deserve to feel fresh and clean. Fragrance free, soft and soothing these wipes do the job at a great price, delivered to my door. I'm on my second order since sharing an order with my daughter (in case they were an inferior product) and now we're both believers. These are a great choice for any age, any reason, any use. What else can I say, we will order the 9-pack next time. Glad we tried them!
customer_reviews.author: susankay

customer_reviews.title: SENSITIVE BABY WIPES FOR OUR SCHNAUZERS
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this order so quickly and more excited that it was exactly like it was described. At times our two beautiful Schnauzers chew on their paws. Upon reading about this I found they might have a slight allergy to our grass. So every night when I go outside with them and we come back in, I wipe off their paws with these wonderful wipes. The wipes are large enough that I use one side for the female and one side for the male. Thanks for making such an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Granny from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very soft yet has a strong enough cleansing factor with the pattern on the wipes to effectively clean bottoms, hands and faces. The wipes are not as moist as I would like, but I think it's just because I'm used to pampers and other big name brands being over saturated. Very cute packaging too! The bag of wipes had purple words all over it from "cupcake, sunshine, bean, sugar" just cute little words. The pop up tissue box like opening is very sure and reliable
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes I've tried in a while
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I dislike more in wipes than when they're sopping wet (like water wipes). These are a perfect level of wetness and yes, sometimes it takes more than 1 to clean the baby, but even with a sopping wet wipe that usually happens. I like that these are also gentle enough to use to remove my eye makeup. They come out one by one, not bunched in with others like other brands that are hard to pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: D. Biondolillo

customer_reviews.title: No scent's the best scent
customer_reviews.text: In these days of tissue scarcity, one swipe from a wipe can = a good deal of TP. This sensitive senior tushy doesn't like scents & chems. As long as you remember to discard rather than flush (wipes are H-E-double hockey sticks on lift grinders & septic tanks), these have extended the Angel Soft supply.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the bad reviews. You get what you pay for. They are honestly great. I don’t put much thinking into damn wipes. They do the job. They wipe butts well. Now if you’re looking for wipes that wipe themselves than this is not the product for you. They don’t irritate or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: angel colon

customer_reviews.title: Dry wipes
customer_reviews.text: I always use these wipes. These are a new package and new color but same wipes. These came and they are all totally dried out. They won’t allow me to return either!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very dry wet wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst wipes we tried out of six brands. These are very dry and have hard texture. I don't recommend using it for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: BostonEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, thin wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Who is rating these wipes above 3 stars?? They are sooooo thin and flimsy. I hate them. You have to fold them in half to get any sort of traction, so it’s really not even that great of a value. You might as well spend the extra dollar or two and get the Huggins brand or even Target brand wipes which are much, much thicker. These wipes are just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes but the back of one of the containers was busted open after just two days in the diaper bag. I'm really not sure if it was like that when I got it or not but it was slightly inconvenient having to find another container for them. That aside my boy has very sensitive skin, for example, I can't use Huggies wipes on him but these ones don't give him a rash. I do love these wipes and Amazon did say if I got more open bags they would refund me.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are good wipes. But they are not super strong. I seem to go through these much faster than say the Costco brand ones. However, I do tend to buy these a fair amount. The wipe dispenser is not super tolerant and sometimes I find that I have to dig to get it to come out and when you are dealing with a blow out. It’s not the most favored thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for these wipes. They’re too thin for my liking and have a smell I don’t care for even though they’re labeled sensitive and supposed to be unscented. I will end up giving the whole box to my local Crisis Pregnancy Center and just purchasing something else.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Sachak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was love at first sight, joking aside these baby wipes are great. As an adult I like to feel fresh, I don't really know why its odd that adults can't use baby wipes. Anyway these are nice and thick and have a nice quilted type of pattern and texture. I went from huggies to these and I love these so much better! These are much cheaper than buying 3 packs of huggies and feel way nicer, huggies feel like sand paper compared to these. I would do as the other reviewers have stated and flip them over to get all the wipes wet.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: better than name brands
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these for 'baby butt' and will not attempt to comment on their effectiveness as 'baby wipes'. But if any adults use 'baby wipes' these are well worth the try. Lasts long time. Don't dry out. Subscribe and save price and availability make this a 'must-have' in our house.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes. Love the package
customer_reviews.text: I have these on subscribe-and-saved, and they're the best! I've used them for newborn up to toddler, and we've never had a problem. They're as good or better than national name brands, and my favorite part is that each package has a snap-down lid, so you don't need a tub to put them in. My only complaint is that it can be difficult to pull just one out. I often get 2 or 3 stuck together if I'm only using one hand (which I often am thanks to a squirmy baby).
customer_reviews.author: MargaretNRH

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these wipes have textured dots on one side, they help remove poop easier from my daughter's tush. These wipes don't have an overbearing scent to them since they are made for sensitive skin. I will repurchase these wipes again in the future. I first tried these wipes with a sample contained in a baby box from Amazon when I created my registry.
customer_reviews.author: TiaraDiz

customer_reviews.title: Thick Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are amazing! The value can’t be beat either. They keep their moisture even when used in a wipe warmer. They are gentle enough to be used on our newborns sensitive skin. We also use them with our toddler who has eczema. He hasn’t had any reaction to them at all. I really like the thick structure and softness.
customer_reviews.author: emileeb

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice quality wipe with a soft texture
customer_reviews.text: As a foster mom, we've used many brands of diapers and wipes. This is a really nice quality wipe with a soft texture. It would easily be my favorite wipe because of the quality and the low cost....but the last two babies we've had (and grandbaby) have gotten very red bottoms that began when we started using this wipe. We've had several babies these have worked well for, so you will need to try them on your LO to see, but we will be returning to our more expensive Huggies Natural, which haven't irritated anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is so-so.
customer_reviews.text: As with any of the Amazon brand items, the quality is starting to fade away. I really like these wipes but they tend to dry out very quickly once opened. By the time you get to the last 1/4 of them, don't expect much moisture left. The last order I received, multiple packs were split on the sides so all I got, really, were fluffy sheets that really aren't good for much.
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Have had no children in my house for fifty three years so I don't know what the kiddies would like. I however, love these wipes. They have just the right size, texture, wetness and scent (none) for my use in the bathroom. We have used wipes for years and years but these are absolutely the best I have ever tried. This is my second order. You get a lot for less money. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Very seldom does any product offer the best quality and the best price, but honestly this is one. Far better than Gerber and every other name brand or no-name brand we’ve encountered. Durable, no mess, just right moisture level, stays fresh till end of package, you name it. And cheap enough to not feel like you should try your best not to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jared and Amrita Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, great price, delivered to my doorstep
customer_reviews.text: We love these wipes! We use them for everything, dirty bottom-amazon wipes, Nutella face- amazon wipes, muddy hands- amazon wipes, crayons on the wall- you guessed it amazon wipes. We keep a pack in the car and in each room of our apartment. These are gentle on sensitive skin, do not leave a funky smell like other sensitive wipes, and are durable while still being gentle. If I could change anything I wish the number of packs per box was greater. These are really terrific wipes and perfect for my babies sensitive bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi momma

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our son has eczema and sensitive skin so we decided to try these since they're unscented and marked for sensitive skin. They're our favorite and we've re-ordered like 4 times. They're cheap and they work really well! I actually like them better than some of the name-brand wipes! They don't have a scent at all, so I really love that! They do the job well and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ayala

customer_reviews.title: They work great to care for diaper changes
customer_reviews.text: We switched from Pampers sensitive to these amazon brand sensitive wipes about a year and half ago. They work great to care for diaper changes, after meal clean ups and even getting things off of the fabric on our couch. They are very gentle on our child's skin, but do be careful using them to much on faces during dry months. We have had these on subscribe and save for a while now and with our next child on the way they will continue to stay on order. We suggest this brand to anyone looking for sensitive, low odor, and less expensive options compared to pampers and honest company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit
customer_reviews.text: I got the box at the birth of my baby 01/19, it's April and we've also put 3 packages in our bathrooms and I still have 1 pack left. I guess I should add that I am a mother of 5 so I know my way around a wipe but still that's incredible. They aren't as strong a cloth as some but they're durable enough that you're hands don't become apart of the diaper change. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: TES420

customer_reviews.title: good alternative to the name brands
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm writing a review about wipes but, these are worth it. the price is right and they hold up against the pampers sensitive wipes. thick, moist enough and snap top actually is great for carrying in a bag or keeping several open is various places in your home (bathroom and changing areas). I asked the preschool teachers to review as well (and they see a lot of wipes) and they seemed quite pleased with them, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ferfnstuff

customer_reviews.title: Like these a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when I was unable to purchase Kirkland brand wipes. They are different but I honestly like these better. They don’t rip when pulling them out of the container and the correct moistness. Can’t speak to how these work on sensitive skin as my child doesn’t have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: New wipes cause irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have been happily using the unscented wipes for years, but this last order is different. The texture has changed and the chemicals in the wipes has caused me to feel burning and intense irritation. If your babies cry when you use these wipes PLEASE STOP!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Phenoxyethanol in ingredients...NOT for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Phenoxyethanol As second ingredient. Not good for my sons SENSITIVE eczema prone skin. And won’t accept a return? Terrible experience amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick&Margie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THESE. . . If you have cast iron pipes in your plumbing. . . these will clog your plumbing .. . . just had almost $10,000 worth of replacement pipes done because of this use; especially if you have septic tanks. .
customer_reviews.author: H. Newman

customer_reviews.title: We didn't realize why she was crying on the changing pad for several days until I wiped my face with one - burns like an acne me
customer_reviews.text: Bought several cases, but first package opened and used irritated baby's skin. We didn't realize why she was crying on the changing pad for several days until I wiped my face with one - burns like an acne medication! Spouse tried one on his face and felt the burning also and is red like a sunburn next morning. When I called Amazon to complain they immediately refunded my purchase and said someone from their team will be calling to ask more questions. Besides this issue, we felt the wipes were okay. Great value, kind of weird texture, but work fine as wipes go. If you aren't sensitive to whatever's in them like our family is, would be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Works well. Soft & great for sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my daughter who has very sensitive skin. I love how they feel and work while changing diapers or anything else we use them for. In my opinion it’s a great combination of Pampers and Huggies wipes. Not to think and not to thin and very soft feeling. Great buy. Subscribe and save. Love not having to buy wipes at the store and lugging the heavy box along with a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha
